About Me

My name is Bronya (Roni) Chernyak. I am a Computer-Science Ph.D. candidate at Bar-Ilan University under the supervision of Prof. Joseph Keshet. My research interests are in machine-learning and deep-learning. Specifically, security of algorithms, their interpertability and applications in the domain of speech. Publications Constant Random Perturbations Provide Adversarial Robustness with Minimal Effect on Accuracy Kalman Filter for Adversarial Noise Removal
